title: FS T206 Walter Johnson Hands at Chest PSA 3 Overprint Back *Sold*

posts.post_title: FS T206 Walter Johnson Hands at Chest PSA 3 Overprint Back *Sold*
posts.post_content:
For sale is my Walter Johnson Hands PSA 3 with a Sweet Caporal 350-460 Fact. 42 overprint back. Only 12 with this combo have been seen by PSA. Condition-wise, the card has superior centering and registration both front and back. A mild vertical wrinkle is present top left quadrant. 

Sold / Shipped USPS Priority Paypal FF, (G&S w/fees added), Venmo, Zelle. Earliest timestamps on PMs or this thread of "Sold" take precedence.

[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/D4QtQRah.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/f20wyeKh.jpg[/IMG]
I have reduced the price after reviewing some recent similar sales.
